name: Hell Bar
description:
Welcome to my first Game Jam game! As this is one of my first games, any feedback is welcomed and greatly appreciated.

Hell Bar is a Top-Down, Hack and Slash where you have to survive as many waves as possible in Hells most notorious bar. 

How To Play:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

SPACE - Attack

If you want a better full screen experience, I recommend downloading the file :)

P.S. - My personal record is wave 16

Developer: Craig T. Riding

Art/Tileset: James H. Riding

Music: www.fesliyanstudios.com

SFX: https://sfxr.me/
